name: Nixycon!
tag_list: nixycon, sga-inc, communication, contact, god, unified-commuications-platform
overview:
Nixycon.com is a boutique web services firm offering high end bespoke web development to packaged ultra-low cost web design and marketing solutions internationally. Nixycon.com engages in web design, web marketing, and web presence crafting services primarily to individual clients.

Nixycon.com is owned and operated by SGA, Inc., an IT Consulting Firm started by 16 year old entrepreneur Shalom George Abraham. Nixycon.com provides a myriad of services to its clients, which include corporations, governments and individuals. The firm also engages web marketing and is a leader in content development.
